tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE supplier_contacts (
  supplier_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  supplier_name VARCHAR(50),
  contact_name VARCHAR(50),
  contact_email VARCHAR(50),
  contact_phone VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE supplier_contacts (
  supplier_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  supplier_name VARCHAR(50),
  contact_name VARCHAR(50),
  contact_email VARCHAR(50),
  contact_phone VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE textiles (
  textile_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  textile_name VARCHAR(50),
  textile_type VARCHAR(50),
  supplier_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (supplier_id) REFERENCES supplier_contacts(supplier_id)
);

CREATE TABLE orders (
  order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  order_date DATE,
  textile_id INT,
  quantity INT,
  total_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
  FOREIGN KEY (textile_id) REFERENCES textiles(textile_id)
);

CREATE TABLE order_tracking (
	order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	supplier_id INT,
	order_date DATE,
	material_type VARCHAR(50),
	quantity INT
);

CREATE TABLE Materials (
    material_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    material_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    material_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    supplier_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (supplier_id) REFERENCES Suppliers(supplier_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Orders (
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    order_date DATE NOT NULL,
    material_id INT,
    quantity INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES Materials(material_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Order_Details (
    order_id INT,
    material_id INT,
    quantity INT NOT NULL,
    unit_price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (order_id, material_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (order_id) REFERENCES Orders(order_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES Materials(material_id)
);
